channel.title: Tutorial Request - Editing the Magic Teleports
channel.description:
Not sure if I've posted this in the correct place, but if I have;
I would like a tutorial explaining how to change the Magic Teleport names & Co-ords. I've been looking for this, but I've only managed to find the Emote Teleports (Which I don't want).
If this tutorial already exists, please post me a link, and moderators can lock this topic.
Thanks! :D
